headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: The type of asset that you want to get. Enum values: ADVERTISER : ad account (advertiser account). CATALOG : catalog. TIKTOK_SHOP : TikTok Shop. PIXEL : Pixel. LEAD : Leads. TT_ACCOUNT : TikTok account. This asset type corresponds to the identity type BC_AUTH_TT . Learn more from Identities .

parameters.name: advertiser_show_status
parameters.description: Valid only when asset_type is ADVERTISER . Ad account display status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Advertiser Display Status . If not specified, ad accounts of all display statuses will be returned.

parameters.name: relation_type
parameters.description: The type of the relation between the Business Center and the asset. Enum values: OWNER_BC : The asset is created and owned by the current Business Center. OWNER_PARTNER : The asset is owned by a partner Business Center. OWNER_INDIVIDUAL : The asset is owned by a user.

parameters.name: relation_status
parameters.description: Valid only when asset_type is ADVERTISER , PIXEL , or TIKTOK_SHOP . The status of the relation between the Business Center account and the asset. Enum values: BOUND : The request to manage the asset has been approved by the owner. UNBOUND : The request to manage the asset was approved but has been cancelled by the owner. PENDING : The request to manage the asset is pending on the owner's approval. REJECTED : The request to manage the asset has been rejected by the owner.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: List of assets.

fields.name: asset_type
fields.description: Asset type. Enum values: ADVERTISER : ad account (advertiser account). CATALOG : catalog. TIKTOK_SHOP : TikTok Shop. PIXEL : Pixel. LEAD : Leads. TT_ACCOUNT : TikTok account. This asset type corresponds to the identity type BC_AUTH_TT . Learn more from Identities .

fields.name: asset_id
fields.description: Asset ID. If asset_type is ADVERTISER , this field is the advertiser ID. If asset_type is CATALOG , this field is the catalog ID. If asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP , this field is the TikTok Shop ID. If asset_type is PIXEL , this field is the Pixel ID. If asset_type is LEAD , this field is the form library ID. To obtain more details about form libraries that you have access to, use /page/library/get/ . If asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT , this field is the ID of a TikTok account in a Business Center.

fields.name: asset_name
fields.description: Asset name.

fields.name: relation_type
fields.description: The type of the relation between the Business Center and the asset. Enum values: OWNER_BC : The asset is created and owned by the current Business Center. OWNER_PARTNER : The asset is owned by a partner Business Center. OWNER_INDIVIDUAL : The asset is owned by a user.

fields.name: relation_status
fields.description: Status of the relation between the Business Center account and the asset. Enum values: BOUND : The request to manage the asset has been approved by the owner. UNBOUND : The request to manage the asset was approved but has been cancelled by the owner. PENDING : The request to manage the asset is pending on the owner's approval. REJECTED : The request to manage the asset has been rejected by the owner. When asset_type is CATALOG , LEAD , or TT_ACCOUNT , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: advertiser_status
fields.description: Advertiser status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Advertiser Status .

fields.name: advertiser_account_type
fields.description: The type of the ad account. Enum values: RESERVATION (reservation ad account), AUCTION (auction ad account).

fields.name: advertiser_role
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is ADVERTISER . Business Center user's permissions to the ad account. Enum values: ADMIN : Admin. Manage ad account finances, settings, and permissions. Create and edit ad campaigns and view performance data. OPERATOR : Operator. Manage finances for ad accounts, create and edit ad campaigns, and view performance data. ANALYST : Analyst. View ads and performance data.

fields.name: catalog_role
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is CATALOG . Business Center user's permissions to the catalog. Enum values: ADMIN : Catalog management. Promote products both organically and in ads, and edit products and catalogs. AD_PROMOTE : Ad promotion. Create ads using product catalogs.

fields.name: ad_creation_eligible
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is CATALOG . Whether the catalog can be used in ads when it contains the number of available products required for the ad format. Enum values: NOT_AVAILABLE : The catalog cannot be used in ads. AVAILABLE : The catalog can be used in ads when it contains the number of available products required for the ad format.

fields.name: store_role
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP . Business Center user's permission to the TikTok Shop. Enum values: AD_PROMOTION : Ad promotion. Create ads promoting products from this TikTok Shop.

fields.name: pixel_code
fields.description: The pixel code. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is PIXEL .

fields.name: tt_account_roles
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT . Business Center user's permission to the TikTok account. Enum values: POST : Existing posts permissions, including accessing your own profile info, accessing your own public videos, and accessing your own ad-authorized videos. LIVE : LIVE video permissions (Only available in some regions), including accessing your own profile info and accessing LIVE videos. DIRECT_MESSAGE : Direct message permissions, including allowing everyone to send you a direct message and reading and managing direct messages in your inbox, in addition to messaging or interacting with other accounts on your behalf. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT .

fields.name: owner_bc_name
fields.description: The owner Business Center of this asset. When asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "list": [
            {
                "relation_status": "PENDING",
                "asset_id": "{{asset_id}}",
                "pixel_code": null,
                "asset_name": "{{asset_name}}",
                "advertiser_role": "ADMIN",
                "relation_type": "OWNER_INDIVIDUAL",
                "advertiser_account_type": "AUCTION",
                "domain_status": null,
                "owner_bc_name": "{{owner_bc_name}}",
                "asset_type": "ADVERTISER",
                "advertiser_status": "STATUS_ENABLE",
                "tt_account_roles": null
            },
            {
                "relation_status": "PENDING",
                "asset_id": "{{asset_id}}",
                "pixel_code": null,
                "asset_name": "{{asset_name}}",
                "advertiser_role": "ANALYST",
                "relation_type": "OWNER_INDIVIDUAL",
                "advertiser_account_type": "AUCTION",
                "domain_status": null,
                "owner_bc_name": "{{owner_bc_name}}",
                "asset_type": "ADVERTISER",
                "advertiser_status": "STATUS_LIMIT",
                "tt_account_roles": null
            }
        ],
        "page_info": {
            "total_page": 1,
            "page_size": 50,
            "page": 1,
            "total_number": 2
        }
    }
}
